Question
========

One calculates separately for a group of boys and a group of girls the correlation (pmcc) between the variables Intelligence and Logical Reasoning. For the girls, the pmcc has the value 0.30 (r~m~), for the boys the value 0.60 (r~j~). Possible conclusions are now:________. I. r~m~ is twice as low as r~j~. II. r~m~ is lower than r~j~

Answerlist
----------

* I and II are both correct.
* I is incorrect and II is correct.
* I and II are both incorrect.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* I and II are both correct: Incorrect
* I is incorrect and II is correct: Correct
* I and II are both incorrect: Incorrect
